name: Ceremonial Areas
context: Discovered in the grand ceremonial complex, these tablets were found in sealed chambers beneath ornate altars. The preservation is exceptional due to protective stone casings. The script shows the formal hand of high priests and contains complex ritual instructions and sacred formulas. Several tablets are fragmentary, with portions lost to ancient vandalism or deliberate censorship.
